activities: Personal information of any type received by Ping Identity Corporation (at any of its locations, including Denver, Colorado and Massachusetts) in the course of business activities, including personally identifiable information related to current, former, and prospective employees, customers, suppliers, and contractors of Ping Identity Corporation, used for human resource related activities and otherwise to conduct business, manage customer and supplier relationships, comply with legal and regulatory requirements, and as directed by a data controller when acting as a data processor.
eucountries: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data in any form, including manually processed online or offline data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Data Protection Authorities (FDPIC).
